feed.title: K-Blog
feed.subtitle: All the random things i do

entry.title: Welcome Readers
entry.content:
Welcome readers. As you have understood by now that this is a hello world post. :) I was very excited to wrote my first post today. So i thought to setup environment how long after all this would take. My mistake i underestimated this. No more in the mood of writing a post. May be i would try later.

If you are thinking then why did you even bother to write this. Well because i have spent 3 hours just to get this running.
